intro:
It's a massive Shuckle and what appears
to be a large stash of... juice?
title: The Strong Stuff
description:
The Shuckle that blocks your path looks incredibly strong. Meanwhile, the juice next to it is emanating power of some kind.

The Shuckle extends its feelers in your direction. It seems like it wants to do something...

1.label: Approach the Shuckle
1.tooltip: (?) Something awful or amazing might happen

2.label: Battle the Shuckle
2.selected: Enraged, the Shuckle drinks some of its juice and attacks!
2.stat_boost: The Shuckle's juice boosts its stats!

outro: What a bizarre turn of events.
